original_text: So the boundary shall run from the sea to Hazar-enan, which is on the northern border of Damascus, with the border of Hamath to the north. This shall be the north side.
korean_text: 그 경계선이 바닷가에서부터 다메섹 경계선에 있는 하살에논까지요 그 경계선이 또 북쪽 끝에 있는 하맛 경계선에 이르렀나니 이는 그 북쪽이요

sentences.original_text: So the boundary shall run from the sea
which is on the northern border of Damascus,
with the border of Hamath to the north.
This shall be the north side.
